page.title: 18Home Life.
page.content: Friday. Mum wakes me up. I get washed and dressed while mum helps my younger sister. I usually have Corn flakes & a cup of tea for breakfast then brush my teeth and go to the toilet.I brush my hair, get my bag & then wait for the school bus.The bus keeps stopping for the other children. When we get to school we chatter outside until the bell goes at 9am. We line up & the teacher tells us to go in.I am in Class 3.(the Headmaster's class.) After the register we have assembly in the hall,then Hymn singing and Music.Afterwards we usually do topic work about a period in history. Playtime is at 10.30 & lunch at 12. I have a school lunch and am a server. In the afternoon we have a spelling test and then a Games lesson. The day ends with a General knowledge quiz & Story. I help on the Farm after school
